entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot expand tabs to full width on iOS #22278
  • CollectionView - No cambia la interfaz de usuario al modificar un elemento de un ObservableCollection #22277
  • Don't propagate handler updates when updating the Frame inside VisualElement #22271
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [net9.0][testing] Android Compatibility UITests are not working on net9.0 branch #22267
    .NET 9 Planning
  • SwipeGestureRecognizer is not working when swipe on the child element(scrollview) in the android platform. #22264
  • Reenable the FileVersion test #22263
    Backlog
  • Refactor the windows.cake script #22262
    Backlog
  • Maui Android intent filter ActionView for MimeTypes not working #22261
  • Lack of OnAppeared Lifecycle Event #22260
  • Do not truncate ActionSheet title on Android #22259
    Backlog

Closed

  • Razor-maui-hybrid template shows a black window often. #22273
  • iOS Frame/Carousel/Image does not work on iOS #16003
    Backlog
  • Put MAUI.Blazor to linux now is possible #22242
    Backlog
  • CarouselView crashes IOS app #9775
    Backlog
  • [net9.0][testing] Control iOS device tests don't finish #21362
    .NET 9 Planning
  • In a ToolbarItems, if an item has no icon but just text, MAUI uses the icon from the previous page in the Navigation #7823
    Backlog
  • [ci] Remove mono as requirement #20814
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [build] Remove GitInfo #19185
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Building app on github actions is not updating AndroidManifest.xml #22091
  • [BUG] Detecting iOS Code Signing Authority does not respect PropertyGroup conditions in Visual Studio 17.10.0 Preview 2.0 / .NET MAUI 9.0 #21546
  • [android] Identified crash in toolbar extensions when using a custom image source #22138
  • Border does not resize correctly (android) #20943
  • Windows TitleBar is now permanently transparent showing things underneath (.NET8), did not have this issue before (.NET7) #20976
  • Unable to turn off Fast Deployment for .Net8 Maui Android project #21572
  • HttpClient and AcceptEncoding gzip on Android stoped working after latest SR4 release. #21786
  • Error "The type 'NSObject' is defined in an assembly that is not referenced. You must add a reference to assembly 'Xamarin.iOS, Version=0.0.0.0" #22021
  • Adding +/- sign to numeric entry to allow negative inputs for iOS #17911
  • Off color Switch bar #17939
  • Please let WebView support CSS media query ‘prefers-color-scheme' #18436
  • [WinUI 3] MAUI Grid should be a native Grid #18738
  • Adding buttons to the title bar #19564
  • PagerControl for big screen device #19615
  • Bottom View under the shell #19621
  • ImageCache to clean dictionary instead of keeping semaphores permanently in memory #19656
  • Make AppThemeBinding type public #19725
  • Shell tab algnment as it is made for TabbedPage #19886
  • Provide documentation for Instrumentation / OpenTelemetry #20338
  • Switch Control #21942
  • Gradiant on Label and others components #22046
  • The rapid response of DragGesture Recognizer. #22141
  • Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled on mobile #22146
  • Allow fullscreen by MAUI.Blazor calls #21824
  • Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT) crash on android release when forcing screen orientation #22106
  • UIDevice.CurrentDevice.Orientation return Unknown in 8.0.20 works in 8.0.6 #21922
  • LineHeight with HTML Label not working #22193
  • PointerGestureRecognizer Does not work on android #22199
  • Displaying a map using iOS 17.4 causes crash #22241
  • [Windows Only]ImageButton get stuck in "PointerOver" state if right click #21706
    .NET 8 SR5

PullRequests

Created

  • Shape crash on 125% display size #22283
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner/cat 😻
  • [build] make `TrimMode=full` function like NativeAOT #22282
  • Stop Android from pinning native references to system services #22281
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView loading previous item #22280
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #22276
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Trigger remeasure when constraints on CV changes #22270
    area/collectionview 📃

Merged

  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [main] Update arcade #22265
  • Make sure to copy and push the vs-workloads props #22266
  • Fix text toolbar item icon not removed when navigating on Android #16796
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar, Under Consideration
  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo and Mono dependencies #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix UITests so it can recover from unresponsive app #22240
  • [Windows] Fix pointer released event not being handled on ImageButton #21766
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Updated

  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #22234
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in modal pages #22089
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • Fix <ApplicationTitle> encoding in maui-mobile template #22084
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Avoid Carousel changes the current position when window is resized #22222
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [UI Test] Update Appium to 5.0.0-rc.8 #22117
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Remove excess check in iOS input transparency checks #21883
  • [Android] CarouselView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation - fix #22207
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • Remove implicit reference to Maui Compatibility and template references #22203
    area/templates 📄
  • Update SkiaSharp #21648
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] FlyoutHeader size change fix #21692
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/FlyoutPage, community ✨, control-flyout
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • Added a support for GradientBrushes on Shape.Stroke #22208
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
